# Haul-Out Ramp Repairs at Neil’s Harbour, Nova Scotia

## Title and Reference Information

* **Title (English/French)**: Haul-Out Ramp Repairs, Neil’s Harbour, Nova Scotia/Réparation de la rampe de halage, Neil’s Harbour, Nouvelle-Écosse
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: cb-42-12046400
* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: 30005114
* **Publication Date (English/French)**: 2023-11-22

## Tender Details

*   **Tender Closing Date (English/French)**: 2023-12-07T13:00:00 ( Eastern Standard Time / Horaire Standard de l’Est)
*   **Expected Contract Start/End Date (English/French)**: None
*   **Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired/Expiré
*   **G-SIN/UNSPC Information**: Not Applicable / None

## Procurement Information

*   **Procurement Category (English/French)**: CNST
*   **Procurement Method (English/French)**: Competitive – Open Bidding/Concurrentielle – Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
*   **Selection Criteria (English/French)**: Lowest Price/Prix le plus bas

## Conditions and Notice Details

*   **Conditional Set-Aside under the Federal Government Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB)**: This tender is open but may be conditionally set-aside under the Government of Canada’s Procurement Strategy for Indigenous Business (PSIB) if two or more bids from certified Indigenous businesses are received.

## Timeframe and Equipment Details

*   **Scope of Work**: The Contractor must perform and complete all Work by March 31, 2024.  Mobilization/demobilization of any necessary equipment, removal/disposal of existing pre-cast concrete panels and their replacement with new ones, supply/deliver/install new ¾” clear stone as sub-base, and supply/deliver/install new pre-cast concrete panels.
*   **Pages and Attachments**: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25600/30005114---drawing-bil.pdf> ,  <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/25600/30005114---itt
